trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a property can only be set at design time.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否属性仅可以设置在设计时。

trans-unit.source: Members marked with the DesignOnlyAttribute set to `true` can be set only at design time.
trans-unit.target: 成员标记为与设置为 DesignOnlyAttribute`true`可以仅在设计时设置。

trans-unit.source: Typically, these properties exist only at design time and do not correspond to a real property on the object at run time.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，这些属性仅在设计时存在，并且在运行时不对应于对象的实际属性。

trans-unit.source: Members that either have no attribute or are marked with the DesignOnlyAttribute set to `false` can be set during run time.
trans-unit.target: 无特性，或使用 DesignOnlyAttribute 标记的成员设置为`false`可以在运行时设置。

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: A property with the DesignOnlyAttribute set to `true` has its value serialized to the .resx file instead of the `InitializeComponent` method.
trans-unit.target: 具有 DesignOnlyAttribute 的属性设置为`true`了它的值序列化为.resx 文件而不是`InitializeComponent`方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignOnlyAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignOnlyAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a property can be set only at design time; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the property can be set at design time and at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果某属性可以设置仅在设计时;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果在设计时和在运行时，可以设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default value for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignOnlyAttribute"></xref>, which is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignOnlyAttribute.No"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的默认值为<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignOnlyAttribute"> </xref>，即<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignOnlyAttribute.No"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>字段是只读的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the value of the given object is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignOnlyAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定对象的值是否等于当前<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignOnlyAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object to test the value equality of.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的值相等性的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the given object is equal to that of the current; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果给定的对象的值是否等于当前;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号的整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Determines if this attribute is the default.
trans-unit.target: 确定此属性是否为默认值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the attribute is the default value for this attribute class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果属性是为该属性类; 默认值否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a property can be set only at design time.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以仅在设计时设置一个属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a property can be set only at design time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果某属性可以设置仅在设计时;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property can be set at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: 指定在设计时或在运行时，可以设置一个属性。

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>字段是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The No field is the default setting for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 无字段为此属性的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property can be set only at design time.
trans-unit.target: 指定仅在设计时，可以设置一个属性。

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>字段是只读的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
